thread.section_title: tyresonthedrive.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of tyresonthedrive.com | tyresonthedrive.com | 82 of 1961
thread.title: Customer

author: Customer
title: Customer
text: The website allows you to browse at the options of tyres without any pressure from a salesman to buy which he recommends there and then. I booked a two slot for my tyres on the phone the following morning due to purchasing out of office hours. I was able to book a time slot I wanted and they let me know that the locking nut would be required on the day. On the day the fitter rang me to let me know he was on his way and how long he would be. The fitter was polite and efficient and gave advice on the other two tyres which were not fitted without any pressure to buy others
